# Image Processing Functions

Functions for processing and analyzing images including morphological operations, filtering, segmentation, and color space conversions.

## Binary Image Operations

- [binarize](imgproc/binarize.html) - Convert image to binary
- [bwareaopen](imgproc/bwareaopen.html) - Remove small objects from binary image
- [bwconncomp](imgproc/bwconncomp.html) - Find connected components in binary image
- [bwdist](imgproc/bwdist.html) - Distance transform of binary image
- [bwhitmiss](imgproc/bwhitmiss.html) - Binary hit-miss transform
- [bwperim](imgproc/bwperim.html) - Find perimeter of objects in binary image
- [bwskell](imgproc/bwskell.html) - Skeletonize binary image
- [cc2bw](imgproc/cc2bw.html) - Convert connected components to binary image

## Morphological Operations

- [imdilate](imgproc/imdilate.html) - Dilate image
- [imerode](imgproc/imerode.html) - Erode image
- [imopen](imgproc/imopen.html) - Morphologically open image
- [imclose](imgproc/imclose.html) - Morphologically close image
- [imtophat](imgproc/imtophat.html) - Top-hat filtering
- [imbothat](imgproc/imbothat.html) - Bottom-hat filtering
- [immorphgrad](imgproc/immorphgrad.html) - Morphological gradient
- [strel](imgproc/strel.html) - Create morphological structuring element

## Image Filtering & Enhancement

- [imfilter](imgproc/imfilter.html) - Filter image
- [imrankfilter](imgproc/imrankfilter.html) - Rank filter for images
- [imsobel](imgproc/imsobel.html) - Sobel edge detection
- [graydist](imgproc/graydist.html) - Gray-weighted distance transform
- [padarray](imgproc/padarray.html) - Pad array with values

## Image Reconstruction & Segmentation

- [imfill](imgproc/imfill.html) - Fill image regions
- [imreconstruct](imgproc/imreconstruct.html) - Morphological reconstruction
- [imsegment](imgproc/imsegment.html) - Segment image
- [isodata](imgproc/isodata.html) - ISODATA thresholding algorithm

## Regional Extrema & Geodesic Operations

- [imregionalmax](imgproc/imregionalmax.html) - Regional maxima
- [imregionalmin](imgproc/imregionalmin.html) - Regional minima
- [imhmin](imgproc/imhmin.html) - H-minima transform
- [imhmax](imgproc/imhmax.html) - H-maxima transform
- [imhdome](imgproc/imhdome.html) - H-dome transform
- [fillsinks](imgproc/fillsinks.html) - Fill sinks in surface

## Color Space Conversions

- [rgb2gray](imgproc/rgb2gray.html) - Convert RGB to grayscale
- [rgb2lab](imgproc/rgb2lab.html) - Convert RGB to Lab color space
- [rgb2ycbcr](imgproc/rgb2ycbcr.html) - Convert RGB to YCbCr color space

## Image Utilities

- [imcomplement](imgproc/imcomplement.html) - Complement image
